biotools.summary: Web-based application for designing protein expression vectors, artificial gene networks and other genetic constructs composed of multiple functional blocks. Users can download the designed sequence for synthesis or further analysis. Users can also create personal accounts and thus can customize their workspace.

bioschemas.name: GenoCAD
